author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
The Coimbatore Corporation has severed water connection to residents of Ward 51, Sreenivasan and Ramamani, for not paying property tax. The civic body said in a release that they had three assessments to their name and the total outstanding for the three assessments was Rs. 2.47 lakh.

The civic body had reminded them to clear the dues but they did not respond. As a last resort, it disconnected the supply on Tuesday, a release added.

- Staff Reporter
title: Water supply disconnected
